dialog.line: More roast potatoes Katie?
Katie don't ignore your mother, it's me you're angry at.
Katie you can't go on like this forever. I'm not having you sitting here ignoring everyone.
I can't believe what he did. Going up to the school like that when it's none of his business.
Don't talk about me as if I'm not here. I didn't do it to embarrass you; that poor kid was having a hard time. Do you think that's okay then?
She probably brought it on herself anyway.
If it's who I think it is she was always a bit of a weirdo.
So if you think someone's a bit weird it's okay to make their life a misery? I can't believe you two.
Don't take it so seriously Mum. No one really gets hurt, it's just kids having a laugh.
I read in the paper about a poor little girl who took an overdose because she was being bullied.
Oh Gran, there must have been something wrong with her anyway. No one does that just because of a bit of bullying. I get called names sometimes and I don't cry about it.
So what would happen if some bullies really got to you?q
I'd just ignore it Mum; it's the only thing to do.
And if that didn't work? If the bully kept on at you? And don't tell me that wouldn't happen cos you know it does.
I'd hit back. They've got to know you're not an easy target.
And if that didn't work she'd ask her big strong brother to sort them out, wouldn't you short arse?
See! He's just bullied me. Boo hoo.
Ok, look. You know that big bloke over the road that used to always block our driveway with his car?
Yeah.

How did I get him to stop? He's bigger than me so I couldn't hit him; I haven't got six friends who would come round with iron bars to sort him out. If I deliberately scratched his car he'd probably set ours on fire.
So what's your point Dad?
Well what did I do? What did I do? Don't pretend you don't remember. You like having a car handy to take you places. What did I do?
You went to the police Dad.

Yes. Causing an obstruction is against the law, he's a violent threatening bloke, and I don't want you to have to live in a street where the only people who get their way are the biggest thugs. I'm ashamed of you both.
